body:
MAIB Report on the investigation of the accidental discharge of carbon dioxide on board SD Nimble resulting in serious injury to a shore-based engineer at her Majesty's Naval Base, Faslane on 23 August 2011. Report No 23/2012. Published 22 August 2012.
